answerText: Sir Lancelot du Lac[10] This knight is almost a virgin, because King Brandegoris's daughter Claire tricks him into sleeping with her using a magic ring, which is apparently a common occurrence in Arthurian myth.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 6 | 19 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Name some Knights of the Round Table, for 10 points each. [10] This knight has an affair with Guinevere. He is shown the Grail by Elaine of Corbenic, who tricks him into sleeping with her by wearing Guinevere's ring so he thinks she is Guinevere.
